articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra gets $150 off on Best Buy with extra freebie - Dexerto
articles.description: Best Buy has slashed the newest Galaxy S24 Ultra’s price by $150, marking the first price cut since the device was announced in January. You also get an extra freebie with the deal.
